actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the emergency School Aid Act to extend to Franco-Americans the same benefits afforded other minority groups under that act.

summary.text: Provides under the Emergency School Aid Act that Franco-Americans shall receive the same benefits afforded other minority groups under that Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the emergency School Aid Act to extend to Franco-Americans the same benefits afforded other minority groups under that act.
